text: João Nílson Zunino commonly known as Zunino (9 April 1946 – 23 December 2014) was a Brazilian businessman and cardiologist. He served as the president of Avaí Futebol ClubeAvaí Futebol Clube from 2002 until 2013, succeeding Flávio Ricardo Félix. He was also a cardiology doctor and a businessman. He was born in São João Batista, Brazil.Busca Textual Zunino died on 23 December 2014 in Florianópolis, Brazil, aged 68. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Brazilian businesspeople Category:Brazilian physicians Category:People from Santa Catarina
title: João Nílson Zunino
